trans-unit.source: Provides an interface for a <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref> to display Windows Forms or to display a control in a drop-down area from a property grid control in design mode.
trans-unit.target: 提供的介面<xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref>顯示 Windows Form，或在屬性方格控制項在設計模式中從下拉式區域中顯示控制項。

trans-unit.source: The IWindowsFormsEditorService is only available through the <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control.
This service is typically used to display a form from the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>.
trans-unit.target: 此服務通常用來顯示表單，以從<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A><xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>方法</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> invokes the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> to provide a user interface for editing the value of a property, the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method is passed a reference to an <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that can typically provide an instance of the IWindowsFormsEditorService.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>叫用<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>編輯屬性的值提供使用者介面<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>的參考傳遞給方法<xref:System.IServiceProvider>，通常可以提供 IWindowsFormsEditorService 的執行個體。</xref:System.IServiceProvider> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>

trans-unit.source: The methods of this service can be used to display dialog boxes and forms, or to show a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> within a drop down container that is shown on top of the property grid near the area of the value field whose value is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此服務的方法，以顯示對話方塊和表單，或顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>下拉式清單會顯示在屬性方格附近正在編輯其值的值欄位區域頂端的容器內。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: Closes any previously opened drop down control area.
trans-unit.target: 關閉任何先前開啟的下拉式清單控制項區域。

trans-unit.source: This method closes the drop down container area for a control that has been shown using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService.DropDownControl%2A> method, and releases the drop down container's reference to the control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會關閉的控制項，使用已顯示的容器區域下拉式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService.DropDownControl%2A>方法，並釋放的下拉式清單控制項容器的參考。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService.DropDownControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Displays the specified control in a drop down area below a value field of the property grid that provides this service.
trans-unit.target: 顯示指定之控制項的下拉式清單提供這項服務的屬性方格的 [值] 欄位下方區域中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> can call this method to display a specified control in a drop down area over the property grid hosting the editor which uses this service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>可以呼叫這個方法，以裝載編輯器 使用這項服務的屬性方格上方，顯示下拉式區域中的指定的控制項。</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: When possible, the dimensions of the control will be maintained.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能的話，仍會維護控制項的維度。

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible due to the screen layout, the control may be resized.
trans-unit.target: 如果這是不可能會因為螢幕的配置，控制項可能會調整大小。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the control resizes neatly, you should implement docking and anchoring, and possibly any resize event-handler update code.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保控制項會調整大小整齊，您應該實作停駐和錨定，並可能是任何調整大小事件處理常式更新的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: If the user performs an action that causes the drop down to close, the control will be hidden and disposed by garbage collection if there is no other stored reference to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者執行動作 [關閉]，控制項下拉式清單會隱藏並處置透過記憶體回收，如果沒有其他的原因，儲存控制項的參考。

trans-unit.source: The drop down list <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> to open.
This method displays the specified form.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會顯示指定的表單。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"></xref> indicating the result code returned by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult"> </xref>所表示的結果碼傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form"> </xref>。
